name: China Shop (Violent Quiche, YellowPeren, Emti, BlueLizard)
name_original: China Shop (Violent Quiche, YellowPeren, Emti, BlueLizard)
description:
Click on the enemies to build up speed and smash them to pieces! 

Once there aren't many left they're hard to hit, so try to take them out quickly to charge up the bomb. Touch it once charged up to wipe out the whole screen!

If the last enemy is being tricky, you can press space to reset the level and attempt to activate the bomb again.

Hit Escape to return to the main menu.

The build process messed up the physics really badly, so a lot of fine tuning was lost and now it feels really weird :/
